name: Fajr
details: This is one of the five obligatory prayer. Which we pray in the morning

name: Dhuhr
details: This is one of the five obligatory prayer. Which we pray at noon

name: Asr
details: This is one of the five obligatory prayer. Which we pray in the afternoon

name: Magrib
details: This is one of the five obligatory prayer.Which we pray after sunset

name: Isha
details: This is one of the five obligatory prayer.Which we pray at night

name: Tahajjud
details: This is one of the optional prayer.Which is prayed after one third of the night
